name: Ollie's Journey
description:
Game developed for LudumDare 33
Developed within 72 hours with the briefing "you are the monster".

LudumDare 33 Page:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=40832

In this game, you control Ollie, a boy who got lost in a mysterious forest and needs to find his way back home. During his adventure, he might find out that some things are just not what they seem.

Controls:
Movement: WASD/Arrows/Stick or D-pad
Jump: Space/A Joystick
Normal Attack - Q/X Joystick
Air Attack - On Air and S/Down Arrow/D-pad Down/Stick down
Interact - E/Y Joystick

Xbox360 Gamepad is recommended!

I hope you enjoy and, if possible, leave some feedback!
